text: Stephen Toulouse, also known as Stepto, (1972 - October 26, 2017) was the former Director of Xbox LIVE Policy and Enforcement at Microsoft. He represented Microsoft and Xbox Live in many media events, including on Larry Hryb's "Major Nelson Radio" Xbox-related podcast, to discuss security and policy issues. Before joining the Xbox team at Microsoft, Toulouse was the head of communications for security response with the Microsoft Security Response Center. Toulouse died on 26 October 2017 at the age of 45. ==References== ==Other websites== *Stephen Toulouse's gamer profile *Stephen Toulouse's Twitter feed *Major Nelson Radio Podcast website Category:1972 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Engineers from Washington (state) Category:Microsoft people
title: Stephen Toulouse
